text: Ni shuo:“Nandao women she an la er qidao na duiyu women ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi ma? Zai an la yindao women zhihou, women beipan zhengdao, youru zai mihuo de qingzhuang xia bei emo yinyou dao wu renyan di difang de ren yiyang ma? Ta youxie pengyou, jiao ta lai zunxun zhengdao, shuo:‘Ni dao women zheli lai ba!’(Ta bu tingcong, yizhi huimie)”. Ni shuo:“An la de yindao, cai shizheng dao. Women fengming guishun zhong shijie de zhu.”
